org.kaaproject.kaa.server.common.dao

Interface CtlService

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    CtlServiceImpl

    public interface CtlService
    Common type library service.

      • findSiblingsByFqnTenantIdAndApplicationId

        List<org.kaaproject.kaa.common.dto.ctl.CtlSchemaMetaInfoDto> findSiblingsByFqnTenantIdAndApplicationId(String fqn,
                                                                                                       String tenantId,
                                                                                                       String applicationId)
        Find CTL schema meta infos which are the application level siblings to the CTL of the given fully qualified name, tenant and application identifiers.
        Parameters:
        fqn - the fully qualified.
        tenantId - the tenant identifier.
        applicationId - the application identifier.
        Returns:
        the CTL schema meta information objects which are the siblings to the given CTL.

        org.kaaproject.kaa.common.dto.file.FileData deepExport(org.kaaproject.kaa.common.dto.ctl.CTLSchemaDto schema)
        Exports the body of a CTL schema with all dependencies as different files, recursively.
        Parameters:
        schema - A CTL schema to export
        Returns:
        An archive containing the body of a CTL schema as a file and all dependencies as different files, recursively.
